Token.Abstract: UIBezierPath+Arrow constructs a bezier path for a typical block arrow with filled head.

Constructs a bezier path for an arrow. The tail and tip points define the centre of the tail and tip of the arrow, respectively, and the arrow's path is created in between for the specific constrains.

Parameter.Name: tailPoint
Parameter.Abstract: The point that indicates the centre of the arrow's tail

Parameter.Name: tipPoint
Parameter.Abstract: The point that indicates the tip of the arrow's head

Parameter.Name: tailWidth
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the size of the tail width

Parameter.Name: headWidth
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the size of the head width

Parameter.Name: headLength
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the size of the head length

ReturnValue.Abstract: The bezier path of the arrow
